dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strongly assert their position and stand firm, even if it means clashing with others.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and try to find a mutually beneficial solution that satisfies all parties involved.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach problem-solving or decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and data to make informed decisions, weighing pros and cons carefully.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on experience and emotional intelligence to navigate complex situations.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin engage with others in social settings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and enthusiastic when interacting with others, making an effort to connect with everyone around them.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social situations and may take time to warm up to new people or environments.

dimensions.label: Creative Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach creative problem-solving or brainstorming?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think on their feet and come up with innovative solutions through trial and error.
Your FarTwin will carefully plan and strategize before acting, making sure to consider all potential outcomes.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information or skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams, charts, and videos.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through verbal explanations, discussions, or lectures.

dimensions.label: Time Management Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and adjust their schedule as needed.
Your FarTwin will plan out their day, week, or month in advance, sticking to a tight schedule.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin typically express and manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their feelings, sometimes to the point of being perceived as overly sensitive.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with close confidants or when necessary for a particular situation.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach global issues or cultural differences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will view the world as a small, interconnected place, welcoming diverse cultures and ideas.
Your FarTwin will prioritize their own cultural heritage and nation's interests over global concerns or diverse perspectives.
